MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL21 and LL23 postcode areas of Corwen and Bala, affecting properties in a widespread area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  12:06 PM. Our engineers have arrived at the local area  to investigate the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:15 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:23 PM on 7th March  2021..
